channel.title: The Announcement
channel.description:
Hey everyone! I've teased a big "announcement" over the last while, to be revealed when I hit 300 followers on Soundcloud.
Well. I did.
So here it is! The big announcement! This announcement has multiple parts, so here goes:
**Deep Space EP** I'm creating a six track EP, to be released late November or early December. As part of this announcement, I am releasing the first track, _Sonnet_, which is available on Soundcloud tonight.
**Streaming Services** As per listener request, I will be releasing my best tracks on other streaming services such as iTunes and Spotify this month! Almost everything from _Catalyst_ forward will be included, so stay tuned!
Lastly, I would like to take a moment and thank you all SO much for helping me to get to this point. 300 Soundcloud followers is obviously a big milestone, and I couldn't have made it this far without this community. Thanks to everyone who has supported me on this journey!
That's all I have to say for now! Stay tuned for updates on Deep Space EP as well as additional streaming services in the near future!
-MR. ANDERSON

item.title: The Announcement
item.dc:creator: MisterMaster
item.description:
We always move posts like this to the “I’m on Spotify” topic.

You’re welcome to post about your upcoming EP under the #WIP category. Looking forward to having a listen to Sonnet.

Read full topic

5 posts were merged into an existing topic: Wooo I’m On Spotify!

item.title: The Announcement
item.dc:creator: MR_ANDERSON
item.description:
Hey everyone! I’ve teased a big “announcement” over the last while, to be revealed when I hit 300 followers on Soundcloud.

Well. I did.

So here it is! The big announcement! This announcement has multiple parts, so here goes:

Deep Space EP
I’m creating a six track EP, to be released late November or early December. As part of this announcement, I am releasing the first track, Sonnet, which is available on Soundcloud tonight.

Streaming Services
As per listener request, I will be releasing my best tracks on other streaming services such as iTunes and Spotify this month! Almost everything from Catalyst forward will be included, so stay tuned!

Lastly, I would like to take a moment and thank you all SO much for helping me to get to this point. 300 Soundcloud followers is obviously a big milestone, and I couldn’t have made it this far without this community. Thanks to everyone who has supported me on this journey!

That’s all I have to say for now! Stay tuned for updates on Deep Space EP as well as additional streaming services in the near future!

-MR. ANDERSON
